availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Calvin Luther Creekmore (Whitley County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Whitley County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Horatio Creekmore and Lurany Creekmore. Married to Mahala Creekmore. Father of Lorenza Creekmore, Luraney Creekmore, Napoleon B. Creekmore, Addison W. Creekmore, Joseph R. Creekmore, Millard Fillmore Creekmore, Elizabeth Creekmore, Calvin L. Creekmore, Mahala Creekmore, Helen Narcissus Creekmore, Susan Creekmore, and Mary Creekmore. Farmer in Whitley County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Whitley County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Whitley County, District 1, p. 336A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Whitley County, Williamsburg, p. 65.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Whitley County, Whitley Court House Precinct, p. 329A.
"Calvin Luther Creekmore (1823-1906)," Find A Grave, Memorial #18572091, accessed November 22, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/18572091.
